vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μισθαπο-δοσία, ἡ,
payment of wages, recompense, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
reward; punishmentrecompense
primarily the discharge of wages; requital; reward, Heb. 10:35; 11:26; punishment, retribution Heb. 2:2*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 字意為"工酬"
2) 當得的報償或報應
2a) 獎賞
2b) 懲罰 (來 2:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 字意为"工酬"
2) 当得的报偿或报应
2a) 奖赏
2b) 惩罚 (来 2:2)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự trả công; phần thưởng; sự ban thưởng.
